name: Brightness control using ddcutil
description:
Brightness slider for all the monitors detected by ddcutil
This tool uses ddcutil as backend for communication with your display.

Make sure that your user can use following shell commands without root.
	`ddcutil getvcp 10` to check the brightness of a display and
	`ddcutil setvcp 10 100` to set the brightness to 100

More info: https://github.com/daitj/gnome-display-brightness-ddcutil/blob/master/README.md
